alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:45PM CDT until March 31 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Freestone County in central Texas... Central Anderson County in central Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 443 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms was located from near 15 miles east of Fairfield to Bethel, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palestine, Montalba, Brushy Creek, Pert, Yard, Todd City, Neches, Massey Lake, Tennessee Colony and Johnson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
